amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a revenue source through the treatment of income of partners for performing investment management services as ordinary income received for performance of services and reduce accordingly the tobacco tax increase as a revenue source.
amendment.purpose: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a revenue source through the treatment of income of partners for performing investment management services as ordinary income received for performance of services and reduce accordingly the tobacco tax increase as a revenue source.

action.text: Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Webb.

withdrawn.text: Proposed amendment SA 58 withdrawn in Senate.
